scripts.build_all: npm run build_es6 && npm run build_amd && npm run build_cjs && npm run build_global
scripts.build_amd: rm -rf dist/amd && tsc typings/es6-shim/es6-shim.d.ts src/Rx.ts -m amd --outDir dist/amd --sourcemap --target ES5
scripts.build_cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs && babel dist/es6 --out-dir dist/cjs --modules common --sourceMaps --loose all && node lib/copy_dts.js
scripts.build_es6: rm -rf dist/es6 && tsc src/Rx.ts src/Rx.KitchenSink.ts --outDir dist/es6 --target ES6 -d
scripts.build_global: rm -rf dist/global && mkdir "dist/global" && browserify src/Rx.global.js --outfile dist/global/Rx.js && npm run build_closure
scripts.build_perf: npm run build_es6 && npm run build_cjs && npm run build_global && webdriver-manager update && npm run perf
scripts.build_test: rm -rf dist/ && npm run lint && npm run build_es6 && npm run build_cjs && jasmine
scripts.build_cover: rm -rf dist/ && npm run lint && npm run build_es6 && npm run build_cjs && istanbul cover jasmine
scripts.lint: npm run lint_src && npm run lint_spec && npm run lint_perf
scripts.watch: watch "echo triggering build && npm run build_test && echo build completed" src -d -u -w=15
